	We are seeking a Sales Officer responsible for generating leads, following up on potential customers, and ensuring seamless onboarding experience.

	Provide insights on market trends, customer behaviour, and acquisition challenges.
	Support the continuous improvement of acquisition strategies through data-driven recommendations.

	At least 1 - 2 years of experience in sales, business development, or customer acquisition roles, preferably within the gig economy, tech, or mobility sectors.
	Good understanding of business development, customer acquisition strategies, and sales processes.
	Proven track record of acquiring new customers, or business partnerships in a competitive market.
	Experience with lead generation, outreach strategies, and pipeline management.
	Ability to engage potential customers or partners and convert them into long-term relationships or clients.

Sales Officer Job at Gamma Mobility




        
    

        
        Gamma Mobility is a mobility-fintech company fueling the dreams of gig workers across Africa. We empower riders and drivers with vehicles and financial services through innovative solutions and strategic partnerships. With thriving hubs in Nigeria and Ghana, we're rapidly expanding and we would like you to be a part of our journey.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a Sales Officer responsible for generating leads, following up on potential customers, and ensuring seamless onboarding experience.
	This role requires strong communication, persuasion, and relationship-building skills to convert leads into active customers.


Responsibilities


	Identify and acquire new customers through customer referrals, field agents, digital channels, and ride-hailing platform partnerships.
	Organize and participate in community outreach programs and marketing activations to boost customer acquisition.
	Track and follow up on leads to ensure high conversion rates.
	Guide potential customers through the onboarding process, addressing inquiries and concerns.
	Schedule and facilitate customer visits to Gamma Mobility Hubs for profiling and evaluation.
	Maintain accurate records of lead engagement and conversion progress in CRM tools.
	Ensure a seamless customer experience from the first interaction to onboarding.
	Educate potential customers on Gamma Mobility's leasing, financing, and vehicle options.
	Monitor and report on acquisition channel performance, identifying the most effective lead sources.
	Provide insights on market trends, customer behaviour, and acquisition challenges.
	Support the continuous improvement of acquisition strategies through data-driven recommendations.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, Economics, or a related field.
	At least 1 - 2 years of experience in sales, business development, or customer acquisition roles, preferably within the gig economy, tech, or mobility sectors.
	Good understanding of business development, customer acquisition strategies, and sales processes.
	Proven track record of acquiring new customers, or business partnerships in a competitive market.
	Experience with lead generation, outreach strategies, and pipeline management.
	Ability to engage potential customers or partners and convert them into long-term relationships or clients.

Marketing Officer Job at the Lion King Capital Limited




        
    

        
        The Lion King Capital Limited, a newly licensed Asset Management Company, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Officer
Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking vibrant and result-oriented individuals to join our team as Marketing Officers.
	The ideal candidates will be passionate about finance, sales, and customer engagement, with the drive to grow our client base and represent our brand professionally.
	The Marketing Officer will be responsible for client acquisition, relationship management, and promotion of the company’s investment products.
	They will drive brand awareness, manage marketing campaigns, and ensure customer satisfaction to achieve business growth.


Key Roles & Responsibilities
Client Acquisition & Retention:


	Identify and onboard new clients for mutual funds, fixed income, and portfolio management services.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships.


Sales & Marketing Execution:


	Develop and execute sales/marketing strategies to meet monthly and quarterly targets.
	Represent the company at events, seminars, and client meetings.


Brand Awareness & Promotion:


	Market the company’s products via digital, physical, and referral channels.
	Support in creating marketing content, proposals, and promotional campaigns.


Market Research & Feedback:


	Monitor competitor activities and provide feedback to management.
	Suggest innovative ideas for product positioning.


Reporting & Compliance:


	Submit weekly/monthly sales reports.
	Ensure adherence to regulatory and company guidelines.


Qualifications


	Minimum of HND / BSc Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Finance, or related fields
	2–3 years of proven experience in sales/marketing (financial services sector is an advantage).
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
	Goal-oriented, self-driven, and able to work with minimal supervision.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: info@thelionkingcapital.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
